title: Looking for a bidding partner on a mid-sized group of lowgrade t204s

posts.post_title: Looking for a bidding partner on a mid-sized group of lowgrade t204s
posts.post_content:
One more cabal for this Spring perhaps?  

I wasnt really planning on bidding on this particular group but I suppose if I had a teammate or two, I wouldn't mind making a run for it :)  Shoot me a note for more details.  Thanks in advance,
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
The auction for this group ends tomorrow....still searching for a teammate or two. Thanks in advance....
